Comprar entradas para la Convención Naci: Buy tickets for the 2022 iad Spain National Convention
Todos los asesores y managers: All consultants and managers who form part of the iad network in Spain, regardless of their level: Bronze, Silver, Gold and Platinum Managers and Platinum Members.

Es mi primera Convención Nacional: It’s my first time at the National Convention. Why is it important to attend?
La Convención Nacional es uno de los eve: The National Convention is one  of our network’s most important events and is held every year in all of our member countries.  It is the only event where agents, managers, office staff and others get together to celebrate the year’s success and find out about upcoming projects.
Durante la Convención Nacional se realiz: During the National Convention event, we give out prizes for each of the annual challenges, give important news about the coming fiscal year and share unforgettable moments as a team.
Precio 65,00€: Fee 65.00€ (VAT not included). Fee available until 15/08/2022 or while tickets last (first 80 tickets).
*La tarifa “Early Bird,” de coste: *The “Early Bird,” fee is a special price aimed at attendees who buy their tickers well in advance and is designed to reward those who plan and confirm their attendance months ahead of the event.
Precio 89,00€ (IVA no incluido): Fee 89.00€ (VAT not included). Full ticket price set according to the location, content and services offered at the event.  Applicable after 15/08/2022 or when  “Early Bird'” tickets run out.
Managers internacionales con: with sponsorees in iad Spain. Fee 89.00€ (VAT not included).
¿Cuál es el dress code: What is the dress code for the National Convention?
No, no se admiten acompañantes: No, guests are not allowed. iad events are exclusively reserved for members of iad Group.

¿Puedo comprar entradas a mis ahijados o: Can I buy tickets for my sponsorees or my team?
Sí, es posible en la página de compra de: Yes, you can do so on the ticket purchasing page. Once you’ve started the process to buy your tickets, put your sponsoree details in the
y pon tus datos en: section and put your details into the
De esta forma: section. If you follow this process, your tickets will be assigned to your sponsoree and you’ll be registered as the buyer.
¿Puedo comprar varias entradas: Can I buy tickets in my name and then give them to my colleagues or sponsorees?
No está permitido comprar varias entrada: This is not possible, as each ticket is personal and non-transferable and you cannot buy more than one ticket under the same name. However, you may buy tickets for other attendees by putting their details in the  “Attendee details” section. See question 7.
Si has adquirido varias: If you have bought different tickets under the same attendee name, contact
para la modificación de los datos: to change ticket details and avoid admission problems on the day of the event.
¿Hay una cantidad máxima de compra de en: Is there a maximum number of tickets I can buy?
Sí, 2 entradas por compra: Yes. 2 tickets per purchase which is applicable when buying the “Early Bird” tickets at a discounted price. This restriction is applied to ensure a fair chance for all iad agents.
Las entradas adquiridas: Event tickets are non-refundable except in cases where justified proof of a serious reason for not attending is given.
